Html:
Hi and thanks for this gread library.

I noticed that the BytesRecorded parameter always has the same size.
I wanted to know when this size will be different or maybe it is a coincidence that I always get the same size.

Thanks in advance.
yeah, that will normally be the case. Soundcards tend to repeatedly produce buffers of the same size. However, it could theoretically be smaller when you stop recording.
